group_1.narration: I grew up in a bad home.
My dad was almost never around,@always out roaming somewhere.
He rarely brought home any money.@In fact, sometimes he took the money@my mom was trying to save up.
It didn't stop there.@He abused me and my mom, too,@and our troubles were without end.
While this might seem like an exaggeration now…@in those days, it was hell on earth.
So I made a wish to make my dad go away.
…And that's why I became a Magical Girl.@I made a contract to erase him from our lives.
But in the end, my sins came home to roost:@my mom became just like my dad.
She stopped coming home…@She abandoned me and went out to have fun…@She didn't even bother earning money anymore.
All I wanted was a happy family…@I thought if it were just me and my mom,@we could be happy…
And that's when I met Hanna.

group_1.textRight: …Is that your mom over there, Sena?
She ain't the lady you introduced me to before.

group_1.narration: Yeah. I lied to you, Hanna.
I told her I grew up in a normal, happy family,@because I thought it'd be easier for us to get along@if she thought I was a normal girl…
Then later, I was afraid that if she found out@I was lying, she'd hate me, so I started making up@new lies to cover for the old ones…
In the end, I introduced complete@strangers as my family to Hanna…@My ideal family, created through suggestion…
My mom walked away, rubbing her eyes.
Was she crying? All this time, she treated me@just like my dad did, as if I wasn't there…@but now that I'm gone, she starts crying about it?
I hate my mom…and I hate that man.@I wish we'd never been a family to begin with…
If they hadn't been there from the start,@everything would've turned out so differently…

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Uh, yeah…from what you wrote in the@exchange diary…

group_1.textRight: Yeah… Well, just like I wrote there,@they were total pieces of shit.
Frankly, seein' 'em croak left me feelin'@refreshed!
Ahaha, I figured you'd say that!
But people are always sayin' it's wrong to think@that way.
Why should I be forced to do that?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's…@It's not right to enforce that belief.
It makes people suffer as a result.

group_1.textRight: …Hey, Sena. Remember what I told you@at the very start?
That we'll tear down everything that keeps@you shackled?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah… I mean, that's the "Let's Ruin Everything@Plan."

group_1.textRight: Every time you say that name, you take the wind@outta my sails… Well, anyway.
Lookin' back, we've been usin' the Witches@as a crutch all along.
It doesn't really feel real, though, right?@Like we haven't really gotten closure.
We gotta take matters into our own hands!
Yeah, your hands are mine, Sena…@So let's do this ourselves!
